scripts.build:miniconda: curl -L -O https://github.com/conda-forge/miniforge/releases/latest/download/Mambaforge-Linux-x86_64.sh && bash Mambaforge-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p $HOME/miniconda && mamba env create -q -f environment.yml && source activate docs
scripts.build:noconda: npm run build:pkg && npm run build:sphinx && next build
scripts.build: export PATH=$HOME/miniconda/bin:$PATH && npm run build:miniconda && npm run build:pkg && npm run build:sphinx && next build
